Featured.name: Evo X
Featured.title: Mitsubishi
Featured.desc: The Mitsubishi Evolution X, also known as the Lancer Evolution X, is a high-performance sports sedan produced from 2007 to 2016. It features a turbocharged four-cylinder engine, all-wheel drive, and advanced handling technology, making it a popular choice among enthusiasts for its rally-inspired performance and sharp handling characteristics.

Featured.name: Wrx/Sti
Featured.title: Subaru
Featured.desc: The 2017 Subaru WRX/STI is a compact sports sedan known for its rally heritage and performance capabilities. It is equipped with a turbocharged flat-four engine, all-wheel drive, and a sport-tuned suspension. The WRX offers impressive agility and acceleration, while the STI variant provides even higher performance with enhanced features like a more powerful engine and advanced drivetrain components.

Featured.name: GTR
Featured.title: Nissan
Featured.desc: The 2018 Nissan GT-R, often referred to as the "Godzilla," is a high-performance sports car renowned for its exceptional speed and handling. It boasts a twin-turbocharged V6 engine, advanced all-wheel drive system, and cutting-edge technology like launch control. The GT-R's aggressive styling and track-ready capabilities make it an icon in the world of sports cars.

Featured.name: Type R
Featured.title: Honda
Featured.desc: The 2016 Honda Civic is a compact car celebrated for its reliability, efficiency, and well-rounded performance. It features a range of fuel-efficient engines, comfortable interior, and user-friendly technology. The Civic's sleek design, commendable safety features, and excellent resale value make it a popular choice in its class.

Recent.name: Gt86
Recent.title: Toyota
Recent.desc: The 2017 Toyota GT86, also known as the Subaru BRZ in some regions, is a compact sports car cherished for its driver-centric design and balanced handling. It is equipped with a naturally aspirated four-cylinder engine, rear-wheel drive, and a low center of gravity for optimal performance. The GT86's lightweight construction, precise steering, and engaging driving experience make it a favorite among driving enthusiasts.

Recent.name: Supra
Recent.title: Toyota
Recent.desc: The 2002 Toyota Supra is a legendary sports car celebrated for its powerful performance and iconic design. It features a turbocharged inline-six engine, rear-wheel drive, and precise handling. The Supra's sleek, aerodynamic profile and potent engine make it a sought-after collector's item, known for its impressive speed and tuning potential in the automotive enthusiast community.

Recent.name: Golf R
Recent.title: Volkswagen
Recent.desc: The 2018 VW Golf R is a high-performance variant of the popular Volkswagen Golf hatchback. It boasts a turbocharged four-cylinder engine, all-wheel drive, and a sport-tuned suspension. With its potent powertrain and agile handling, the Golf R offers a blend of practicality and spirited driving dynamics. Its understated design and versatile nature make it a compelling choice for enthusiasts seeking a versatile yet exhilarating driving experience.

Recent.name: Yaris
Recent.title: Toyota
Recent.desc: The 2016 Toyota Yaris is a compact car known for its fuel efficiency, practicality, and user-friendly features. It is equipped with a small yet efficient engine, providing excellent gas mileage. The Yaris offers a comfortable interior, easy maneuverability, and a reputation for reliability, making it an appealing choice for urban commuting and budget-conscious drivers.
